item.description:
Coro-Dante all-Italian repertoire Holiday/Christmas Concert presents

Revealed Treasures - Italian Christmas Music from Three Centuries American Premieres and Traditional Italian Christmas Carols

The concert goes from 5pm-6pm.  I will be there 4:45 so we can meet up and find seats.


Admission: free, goodwill offering accepted


Validated parking at Kendal Square Cinema


Afterwards we can go to Cambridge Brewing Company across the street for beer/get-together
item.how_to_find_us: I will be just inside the entrance of the Dante Alighieri Society

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Coro-Dante Italian Holiday Chorus Concert
